I recently purchased this gold watch from Amazon, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! The watch has a luxurious look that makes it appear far more expensive than it actually is.  The gold finish is stunning, with a rich, polished sheen that catches the light beautifully. The design is elegant and sophisticated, making it the perfect accessory for both casual and formal occasions. I've worn it to work, social events, and even on casual outings, and it never fails to elevate my outfit.  One of the most impressive aspects of this watch is its build quality. Despite its affordable price, it feels solid and well-made. The weight is just right—substantial enough to feel premium, but not too heavy to be uncomfortable. The clasp is secure, and the links move smoothly, adding to its overall durability.  I've received numerous compliments on this watch, with many people assuming it's a high-end designer piece. It's amazing how such an affordable watch can have such a high-end look and feel.  The only minor downside is that the gold plating may require a bit of extra care to maintain its shine over time. I make sure to avoid exposing it to harsh chemicals or water for prolonged periods, and it still looks as good as new.  Overall, I highly recommend this gold watch to anyone looking for a stylish, high-quality timepiece that looks expensive but is very affordable. It's a fantastic value for the price and a great addition to any jewelry collection!

评论概述: Exquisite and High quality feeling watch!
评论详情: I recently purchased the BOFAN Gold Watch for Women in the light blue-gold color, and it has exceeded all my expectations! This watch is the perfect blend of elegance and functionality, making it a fantastic addition to my accessory collection.  The design of this watch is truly exquisite. The light blue dial against the gold stainless steel bracelet creates a stunning and sophisticated look that pairs beautifully with both casual and formal outfits. It adds a touch of luxury to any ensemble without being overly flashy.  Quality-wise, this watch is exceptional. The stainless steel bracelet is not only stylish but also durable and comfortable to wear. The quartz movement ensures precise timekeeping, which is essential for my busy lifestyle. I've been wearing it daily, and it continues to perform flawlessly.  One of the standout features is its waterproof capability. I appreciate the peace of mind knowing that my watch is protected from water damage, whether I'm caught in the rain or washing my hands. It's a practical feature that doesn't compromise on style.  The included tools for bracelet adjustment are incredibly convenient. Adjusting the bracelet to fit my wrist perfectly was a breeze, thanks to the easy-to-use tools provided. This thoughtful addition ensures a perfect fit and enhances the overall user experience.  In terms of comfort, this watch is lightweight and fits my wrist beautifully. The small size is perfect, and it sits elegantly without feeling bulky. I've received numerous compliments on its design and elegance, and many friends have asked where they can get one for themselves.  Overall, I am thrilled with my purchase of the BOFAN Gold Watch for Women. It combines luxury, functionality, and style seamlessly. If you're looking for a high-quality, fashionable, and reliable timepiece, I highly recommend this watch. It's a fantastic investment that will elevate your accessory game!

评论概述: Attractive design, keeps good time, easy on and off.
评论详情: I really like the looks, time keeping ability, the draping capability and the weight of this watch. The face is a lovely blue-greenish teal color that reminds me of the waters of the islands. The watch face has markings at 12, 3, 6 and 9 and it has a second hand which is a great feature. It has been keeping time accurately for several days. It comes with the tools necessary to remove links from the watch band if necessary. I have a smaller wrist, but prefer my watches to be worn loose so I did not remove any links. There is a video on the listing showing how to do so. It is straightforward, and appears to be easy.  The time-keeping portion of the watch is not as thin as some watches and the entire piece has a nice weight. It is heavier than my other name brand stainless steel watch band design. The watch comes in a nice box and has protective clear wrap covering on its face and band to be removed before wearing. I really like the band latching system which holds it securely in place and is easy to operate.

评论详情: Beautiful teal colored face with a Japanese movement which includes a second hand. Bracelet-type stainless steel band with a quick lock/unlock clasp. Face of watch has just 4 markings for relative time; I would have preferred one for each hour. Not a bad looking watch for the price.

评论概述: Feels so expensive matches everything. I have a tiny wrist so I love the watch kit to adjust
评论详情: Feels so expensive matches everything. I have a tiny wrist so I love the watch kit to adjust

I wasn't prepared to become a watch tinkerer in the process, but, the tools come with it, and it makes for a unique ability to size this metal band watch exactly to one's wrist. In this case it is for my elderly mother who has a very small wrist so that the watch, as it came, just hung very loose on her wrist. However, the small watch face with the traditional sweeping hands my mother loved. Also the how to adjust this is unique to what I've experienced, and so the requirement of the tools it comes with, which isn't particularly difficult, but also is more than just tightening to a particular notch on a band.  For the price it is an excellent addition to one's watch wear for formal wear, and for more elegance on the wrist. My mother, at her age, really would have trouble fixing the band herself even with the provided tools, so this is to be considered if you are gifting it to another, if you may need to aid them to fit it to their wrist, as at the low cost, they may not find it worth to pay a jeweler to do it, hence why most likely was included the necessary tools for this interesting band.

I was excited to see this in my queue since I have small wrists and most watches either have dials that are too big or straps that don't fit small wrists well. I'm disappointed that they've taken down the video on how to remove links from the strap to adjust this to one's wrist. The instructions included show one how to set the time in a variety of their watches which is pointless since that is child's play. Nothing on how to adjust the strap to one's size. It is not the most intuitive and it would likely take two people. It's odd to make things so complicated when a simple mechanism to clasp out links that exist in many watches could've been used instead. Their motto is Less is More yet they've used too many bits and pieces and made their own product too complicated. I did consider that if this worked for me, I could also order another to be gifted. But I'm not so sure now. It certainly is a giftable item if you have larger wrists (for context, the model shown in the pictures has larger wrists than mine and mine are at least 2 links smaller). It may indeed work for you as is. The watch appears well made, pretty and functional. The dial color is somewhat different than what's shown in the product's images. But that is too be expected. Setting it, like I stated, is probably the easiest thing one has been doing since being a kid. The tools included are fine and all but they are not the best. The shorter one offers better grip while the longer one can easily hurt a person since there is just a tiny part where the non slip grips are made. It slips easily and is somewhat sharp. Also without the video they had before and they also talk about in the description, you are just trying this to see if the two tools can be used simultaneously. Very odd design. The watch comes in a nice box and is gift ready at that, with a thin protective film on the dial, the clasp, and both strap pieces. There is a small area where you can store the links removed but first you have to get there. The clasp itself is fairly common and very easy to use to take off from or secure on one's wrist. 4 on 5 because of the complexity on taking out links from the strap. Just measure your wrist and if it works for you without the need to adjust the strap, you'll likely find it is a 5. I don't want to wear a loose watch that can then get in the way and get scratched easily too. Update: I found the package was missing the piece where the one screw driver goes in and keeps the watch in place. Still managed without. Took out 6 links to resize.
I love it is so dainty yet sturdy looking. The blue green color of the face looks really nice next to the gold. Overall love this watch to help add a dose of elegance

This Elegant lady's quartz watch has a 'smaller, rectangle shaped face with a gold stainless steel bracelet. It is waterproof, but not to the extent it can be worn in the shower or swimming. I really like the smaller size because I do have very petite wrists and usually have trouble finding a bracelet style watch that fits. This came with a tool to adjust the length and it does fit up to 7.09 inches. The face is protected with Mineral glass to prevent scratching. I am very happy with this attractive watch and think it would make the perfect gift for birthdays, Christmas or any other occasion and especially with such a great price!
I am in love with this watch! I did remove two links, it did take a little time to remove but the links were easy to remove. It’s a stackable watch!

I'm obsessed with this watch. It's so cute and looks much more expensive than it really is. I do wish it came with written instructions on how to adjust the band but the product listing does have a video on how to do it and I was able to adjust it by removing some links following that video. Definitely be careful though because the screws are tiny and easy to lose! 10/10 love this watch
